text: tamantama aparadha kara gattavun lesa sitiya di ovun va malakvaru maranayata pat karana vita “numbala kavara tattvayaka sitiyehu dæ” yi vimasati. evita “mahapolove api dubalayin lesa sitiyemu” yæyi ovuhu pavasati. “allahge mahapolova vyapta vuvak lesa notibuneda? eheyin numbala ehi samkramanaya vimata tibuni” yæyi pavasati. movun pivisena sthanaya niraya ve. eya navatænin ita napuruya
